channel.title: [C4D] Lightsaber and R2D2
channel.description:
A very high detailed model of a Lightsaber, took 4 hours.
[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n94/archerer98/lswgi.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n94/archerer98/lightsaber-1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n94/archerer98/lswb.jpg[/img]
R2D2 model.
[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n94/archerer98/r2d2wip22.jpg[/img]

item.title: [C4D] Lightsaber and R2D2
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

He made them, end of story. I was there when he made them, shut up about it.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lightsaber and R2D2
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“Hellman1, post:39, topic:256718”][quote author=Archer link=topic=339060.msg2719254#msg2719254 date=1237853371]

lmfao nice fake.

I googled “lightsaber model” and this came up on the 3rd page.

[size=25pt]FAIL[/size]

You sir, fail. gravedigging is for failures.

Since he grave dug it, I will post the wire frames to prove it is real if Frell wasn’t enough.


[/quote]

The wire frame doesn’t prove anything… Post a few pics of how you made it, and I might believe you…

I want to believe you made this, I really do. But, with all the other posers out there, I try not to be too optimistic.[/quote]

Alright then, you can also go to moparisthebest and look in their graphics section at my models.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

r2d2wip21.jpg777×524

r2d2wip7.jpg778×525

r2d2wip2.jpg779×528

Read full topic

You sir, fail. gravedigging is for failures.
[/quote]

Since he grave dug it, I will post the wire frames to prove it is real if Frell wasn’t enough.

[/quote]

The wire frame doesn’t prove anything… Post a few pics of how you made it, and I might believe you…

I want to believe you made this, I really do. But, with all the other posers out there, I try not to be too optimistic.

item.title: [C4D] Lightsaber and R2D2
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“Archer, post:25, topic:256718”][quote author=Thornton136 link=topic=339060.msg2635393#msg2635393 date=1232481703]
still think its great!!

Would it be possible to make a lightsaber for RS private server?
[/quote]
low poly always looks semi-shitty. mid-high poly is where its at so ur curves dont look like straight line edges.

I can make a low poly light saber but I would never do that since I prefer to make very high poly models.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lightsaber and R2D2
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:19, topic:256718”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=339060.msg2631841#msg2631841 date=1232228446]
what was the point of posting if the polygon count is high?
[/quote]

inspiration. right now the modelling section seems like a joke. few people visit here. and those who do arent great as modeling. and no, im not saying im a good modeller. epecially since in no way could my stuff be compared to this.[/quote]

It just takes A lot of practice. I have been modeling for well over a year now and ive spent 11-15 hours a day modeling a guitar when on a break from school.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lightsaber and R2D2
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:20, topic:256718”][quote author=Frell link=topic=339060.msg2631456#msg2631456 date=1232204919]
It will crash your client.
[/quote]

I was thinking, is there a way we could “change” the client to allow more polygons.[/quote]
Probably not, Gower wrote the 3D engine the client is using, and it has a limit. If you changed the limit there would probably be much lag.

Read full topic
